verses.verse: 'Now <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H5315>anyone<s%> <S%H7126>presents<s%> a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> as an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> shall be of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on it.

'He shall then <S%H935>bring<s%> it to Aaron's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests;<s%> and shall <S%H7061>take<s%> from it his <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H7062><s%> of its <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> and of its <S%H8081>oil<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> of its <S%H3828>frankincense.<s%> And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> [as] its <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H234>portion<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> of the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> belongs to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> a <S%H6944>thing<s%> <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H801>fire.<s%>

'Now when you <S%H7126>bring<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> of a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H3989>baked<s%> in an <S%H8574>oven,<s%> [it shall be] <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>spread<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

'And <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> [made] on the <S%H4227>griddle,<s%> [it shall be] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour,<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%>
you shall <S%H6626>break<s%> it into <S%H6595>bits,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it; it is a grain <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

'Now <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H6213>[made<s%>] in a <S%H4802>pan,<s%> it shall be made of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

'When you <S%H935>bring<s%> in the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> it shall be <S%H7126>presented<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and he shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> then shall <S%H7311>take<s%> up from the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> its <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H234>portion,<s%> and shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> [as] an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> of the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> belongs to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> a <S%H6944>thing<s%> <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H801>fire.<s%>

<S%H3605>'No<s%> <S%H3808><s%> grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7126>bring<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven,<s%> for you shall not <S%H6999>offer<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> as an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'As an <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H7225>first<s%> <S%H7225>fruits,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> them to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but they shall not <S%H5927>ascend<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Every<s%> grain <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H4503><s%> of yours, moreover, you shall <S%H4414>season<s%> with <S%H4417>salt,<s%> so that the <S%H4417>salt<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> shall not be <S%H7673>lacking<s%> from your grain <S%H4503>offering;<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7133>offerings<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

'Also <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7126>bring<s%> a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H1061>early<s%> <S%H1061>ripened<s%> <S%H1061>things<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H24>fresh<s%> <S%H24>heads<s%> of <S%H24>grain<s%> <S%H7033>roasted<s%> in the <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H1643>grits<s%> of <S%H3759>new<s%> <S%H3759>growth,<s%> for the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of your <S%H1061>early<s%> <S%H1061>ripened<s%> <S%H1061>things.<s%>
'You shall then <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it and <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H3828>incense<s%> on it; it is a grain <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> its <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H234>portion,<s%> part of its <S%H1643>grits<s%> and its <S%H8081>oil<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3828>incense<s%> as an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
